channel.title: WarpKey Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.0.4
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey

    • App Assignment Fixed: Resolved a critical bug where the hotkey for assigning new apps (combining Secondary Keys and App Triggers) was not being recognized.
    • Improved Collision Logic: The app now correctly prevents a key from being used in both the App Triggers and Secondary Keys groups simultaneously.

item.title: Version 1.0.3
item.description:
What's New in WrapKey 1.0.3

    • New Menu Bar Launcher: The menu bar icon now opens a quick-launch menu to run your shortcuts directly.
    • Hotkey-Optional Shortcuts: You can now create shortcuts without assigning a hotkey, making them accessible from the new menu.
    • Fixes & Polish: Corrected the app version display, made the author credit a colored link, and cleaned up the UI for a better experience.

item.title: Version 1.0.2
item.description:
• New: Added a HyperKey feature.
  • New: Added an app selection popup when adding a new application.
  • Improved: More robust permissions checking.
  • Fixed: A crash that occurred when clicking the help page from the welcome screen.
  • Fixed: An issue with the light theme display.
  • General bug fixes.

item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description:
• New: Added a "Check for Updates" button in the App Settings screen.
  • Fix: Resolved a startup crash related to the update checker.
